markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sapling Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1860)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 22 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Buckler](/Shields.aspx?ID=1), [Tower Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=4)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This surprisingly weighty, though well-balanced, wooden [buckler](/Shields.aspx?ID=1) is emblazoned with the image of a sapling. The sapling withers as the shield takes damage.

<document level="2" id="action-1558" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
